title: Saturn Transit in the 7th House: Commitment Tested by Time
summary: When Saturn transits the 7th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, partnerships, marriage, and business alliances face tests of responsibility and endurance. Relationships demand maturity, honesty, and clearly defined boundaries. Superficial connections weaken, while serious bonds strengthen through patience. Business dealings move slowly but become reliable when built on structure and fairness. This transit teaches that lasting partnerships are not formed by attraction alone, but by accountability, mutual respect, and long-term commitment.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Greater awareness of responsibility in relationships
Serious and realistic outlook toward partnerships
Less tolerance for imbalance or dependency

sections.title: Career
points: Slow but stable progress through alliances

sections.title: Mental & Inner State
points: Need to balance duty with warmth

closing: Saturn in the 7th house shows that relationships built on responsibility and time become unbreakable.
